column5: Congrats to Ryan Bellows, your week 2 winner with a 23lb chinook! 4 more days to go and we'll play all over again!    No limit to number of anglers on board. Only one registration per boat by the captain. Biggest Chinook Salmon caught and entered by the captain that Saturday wins 100% of the pot. Winning moneys to be picked up on the following Monday.  Blow decision will result in draw of the prize money.  Updates on Facebook and Twitter.
fun day on the water other than the free shower, sounds like plenty of fish being caught down this way lately
forecast for saturday is looking good same with the wind, there have been plenty of big fish caught lately sign up and give it a shot you could be walking away with some extra cash in your pocket
14 boats entered so far for tomorrow, possibly a few more by the end of the day looking to be another fun day on the water and hopefully going to produce some big fish.
